content: This is key point. If you were a “spray and pray” then the expectation is that you would have covered it in that strategy. What you’re saying which is super important is that you do NOT do “spray and pray” venturing. Spray and pray for folks who aren’t inside the VC ropes is that you invest small amounts in everything that moves in hope that one will hit. This is the swing at every pitch mindset (not that there is anything wrong with that).
